content: free cactus crochet pattern this mini cactus has a perfect keychain size if you make it from sport weight cotton yarn if you want to make a bigger cactus use thicker yarn and a bigger crochet hook if you want the cactus to stand up please use heavy filling in the bottom of the cactus this free cactus crochet pattern is available as a free written pattern but it also has a full video tutorial included
